name: HELLICA
description:
HELLICA is a mix of bullet-hell and psychological-horror! It has a mysterious story too! There will be future DLCs (which are most likely free! and some extras are paid because I put a lot of time and effort!) ----------------------------- ~~~~Dev~~~~   Zordoron Rez ----------------------------- ~~~~Voice actors~~~~ Takura Chabayanzara starring as Akumu Darren Y starring as Ron ----------------------------- Could you beat your bullet-hell lucid nightmare? Or will you stay up and encounter more of the horrid frights?

There are THREE main endings. Estimated Overall Length is about 30min-1.5hrs (depending on the skill and problem solving of the player.).

Hint: Save the damage you inflict to the big monster after skipping the flashback. Load the save file again and you are back from the amount of damage you inflicted!
